document.full_text: brazil reassured fifa on monday they will be ready to stage a good world cup in 2014 after the world soccer governing body's president sepp blatter criticized delays in the country's preparations.
document.title: brazil tells blatter not to worry about 2014 readiness
lines_and_colors: brazil reassured fifa on monday they will be ready to stage a good world cup in 2014 after the world soccer governing body's president sepp blatter criticized delays in the country's preparations.
